text: The following is a list of prime ministers of Angola, from the establishment of the office of prime minister in 1975. The office was abolished in the constitution of 2010. ==Prime ministers of Angola (1975–2010)== |- style="text-align:center;" ! colspan=8| People's Republic of Angola |- style="text-align:center;" | colspan=8| Post abolished (9 December 1978 – 19 July 1991) |- style="text-align:center;" ! colspan=8| Republic of Angola |- style="text-align:center;" | colspan=8| Vacant (29 January 1999 – 6 December 2002) ==See also== *Angola **President of Angola ***List of Presidents of Angola **Vice President of Angola **Prime Minister of Angola **List of colonial governors of Angola **List of heads of state of the Democratic People's Republic of Angola **List of heads of government of the Democratic People's Republic of Angola *Lists of incumbents *List of national leaders ==Notes== ==References== ==Sources== * * * * * Category:Government of Angola Category:History of Angola Category:1978 establishments in Angola Category:2010 disestablishments in Angola
title: List of prime ministers of Angola
